title: OS for CS people
content: How was the exam? And what was the answer to that graph question?? Yes, No, Maybe?

comments.body: I just guessed i don't evn have that subject lol
What graph? If it is a deadlock or not one? I wrote No because it wasn't really deadlock situation imho

Yeah I also wrote no 
But some1 was saying 1 process was asking all 3 instances of a resource and not just 1 instance so idk lmao i am just happy isa got over
